(Well, Air, it depends.  You may just want to join a group and wait for them 
to engage in battle.  Or you could go to a battle and open fire on the side 
you don't like, or everyone.  IE, a battle between TheCODE's "Mafia" and the 
Alliance is close at hand.  You could just wait until that happens, then join 
the fight guns blazing.  Have your character head in that direction and 
arrive and start shooting at people)

Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
